description:
Output state contract for the stamper node (node-local).

This model defines the output structure returned by stamper node execution.
All fields are validated according to the current schema version.

Fields:
    version: Schema version for output state (must match input version)
    status: Result status of the stamping operation
    message: Human-readable result or error message
    correlation_id: Optional correlation ID propagated from input for telemetry

correlation_id.description: Optional correlation ID propagated from input for telemetry
correlation_id.title: Correlation Id

operation_signature.description: Optional cryptographic signature of the operation (sensitive field)
operation_signature.title: Operation Signature

status.description: Result status of the stamping operation
status.title: Status

version.description: Schema version for output state (must match input version)
version.title: Version

title: StamperOutputState
